title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
Meet the Just My Size Wireless Bra: soft, supportive, and simple to use.

What it is:
- A comfortable, wirefree bra with full coverage.
- Available in many sizes, from 32C up to 50DD.
- Comes in classic colors (white, nude, and more) plus a fun leopard satin option.

Why it’s easy and comfortable:
- No underwire. Gentle support you can wear all day.
- Wide band for a secure, smoothing fit that doesn’t pinch.
- Front-adjustable straps. You can tighten or loosen the straps without reaching behind your back.
- Hook-and-eye back closure with multiple rows, so you can choose the fit that feels best.
- Soft, stretchy fabric: 90% nylon, 10% spandex for a flexible, breathable feel.

What you get:
- Each pack includes 1 bra, with a satin option available in leopard print for a touch of style.

Good to know:
- Full coverage helps prevent spillover and keeps you comfortably covered.
- Smooth under clothes, great for everyday wear.
- Easy-care materials designed for regular use.

If you want a bra that’s gentle, easy to put on, and supportive without wires, this Just My Size Wireless Bra is a simple, reliable choice.
